justzoom.options.base_zoom_modifier.desc:
The FOV modifier the mod should start with when zooming.
This should be a floating point value between 0.0 and 1.0.
A smaller value means a more zoomed view.
justzoom.options.zoom_in_change_modifier:
How much the FOV modifier should change when scrolling.
A bigger value means less smooth zooming.
justzoom.options.zoom_out_change_modifie:
How much the FOV modifier should change when scrolling.
A bigger value means less smooth zooming.
justzoom.options.smooth_zoom_in_out.desc: If the FOV should change smoothly when zooming in/out.
justzoom.options.smooth_camera_movement_: If the camera should move smoothly (cinematic) when zooming.
justzoom.options.normalize_mouse_sensiti:
If the mouse sensitivity should adjust itself to the zoomed view,
so it feels normal and not too fast when moving the mouse while zooming.
justzoom.options.allow_zoom_in_mirrored_: If enabled, zooming will be possible in the mirrored view (when you see yourself).
If enabled, the player's arms will be invisible while zooming.
justzoom.options.reset_zoom_factor_when_:
If enabled, the zoom factor will be reset to the base value when you start zooming,
instead of continuing from the last zoom level.
justzoom.options.options_button_corner.d:
The corner of the Pause screen where the Just Zoom options button should appear.

You can completely hide the button in Just Zoom's config.txt file.
